title: Enhancing Nursing Students’ Wellbeing and Educational Adaptability in the COVID-19 Era

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Focus on adapting to COVID-19-induced educational changes, stress management, and clinical practice adaptability

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more factors influencing nursing students' well-being in the context of COVID-19.
Learners can apply stress management strategies in mobile learning environments to practical settings.
Through project-based assessment, learners can propose alternative clinical practice learning models.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
